Package main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boss
    The Boss class represents the final boss character of the game When the Boss is killed by the player it runs the normal Enemy.kill() method of the enemy class, as well as spawning the TheAbodeth pickup that allows the player to end the game.
    Character
    An abstract class to define all the common attributes that both the Player and all Enemy objects will have
    Enemy
    The Enemy class represents all enemies that can be spawned in the game.
    Player
    The main Player object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Character.Facing
    Describes which way the character is currently facing
